official_title: Assistant Professor of Economics, NYU Shanghai; Global Network Assistant Professor, NYU
bio:
Ye (Wendy) Jin is an Assistant Professor of Economics, NYU Shanghai; Global Network Assistant Professor, NYU. She holds a PhD in Economics from University of California and a B.A. and a M.A from Tsinghua University.

Professor Jin’s research interests are Game Theory, Behavioral Economics, and Experimental Economics.  Her work has appeared in Journal of Comparative Economics.
